document_id.description: UUIDv4 message identifier, normally parsed out of the uri by the ingestion edge service.

document_namespace.description: Per-project document namespace, normally parsed out of the uri by the ingestion edge service.

document_type.description: Per-project document type, matching the schema title, normally parsed out of the uri by the ingestion edge service.

document_version.description: Document version number, normally parsed out of the uri by the ingestion edge service.

op.description: Pre-existing Firefox Accounts metrics field used to identify Amplitude metrics events.

submission_timestamp.description: Time when the Firefox Accounts web server received this message, formatted as ISO time string.
